ygData.subject: Re: Is the verdict finally in?
ygData.msgSnippet: Secret passage in Neriak? Never seen it, where is it?  I have been though Neriak in fair detail and never seen it. Tenin ... From: kale usi
ygData.messageBody:
Secret passage in Neriak? Never seen it, where is it? I have been though
Neriak in fair detail and never seen it.

Tenin

----- Original Message -----
From: kale usi <kaleusi@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, August 27, 1999 1:52 PM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Is the verdict finally in?


From: "kale usi" <kaleusi@...>

>From: "Omeg Felligan" <omeg_felligan@...>
>
>NOW THERE'S AN IDEA!!!! if verant releases a patch that makes the sky fall
>we'll ALL be in the Air Plane!!!!! <--enthausim not sarcasim :)
>
>*nudges Trevalien* psss..Air Plane ;)
>
>Omeg
>
Packet sniffing and hackers abound oh my! Sorry, but you'll have to do the
ever elusive Chicken Little quest to get to the Plane of Air like the rest
of us Omeg! I hear it's harder than the Quest for the Fiery Avenger!
<hehehe> On another note - no one over on the EQ-Spoilers list can tell me
how to open the locked secret passage in Neriak. Anyone here now how? I got
a rogue with 150 in pick locks, and he can't get it open either. Perhaps a
key located somewhere nearby?
